skills.name: Unseen Predator
skills.target_range: {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} {{tt|50|Landing distance from target's location at dash start, determines dash length}}
skills.blurb: While in brush, Rengar leaps at his target with his basic attack. Rengar's abilities build Ferocity. Upon reaching full Ferocity, his next ability becomes empowered and grants him Movement Speed on cast, but he instantly loses all Ferocity if he leaves combat. Killing enemy champions awards trophies on Rengar's Bonetooth Necklace, permanently increasing his Attack Damage.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Rengar''' generates {{as|1 Ferocity|buzzword3}} whenever he casts a [[Champion ability|basic ability]] or uses {{ais|Savagery|Rengar}} first attack. Reaching {{as|4 Ferocity|buzzword3}} renders his next basic ability '''empowered''', granting an additional cast along with {{pp|key=%|30 to 50 for 3|1 to 13|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds at the cost of consuming all {{as|Ferocity|buzzword3}}. Reaching {{as|4 Ferocity|buzzword3}} with {{ai|Savagery|Rengar}} or {{ai|Bola Strike|Rengar}} locks its empowered version from use for {{fd|0.1}} seconds before and after casting it. All {{as|Ferocity|buzzword3}} is lost after being [[combat status|out of combat]] for 8 seconds.

While in {{tip|brush}}, '''Rengar's''' [[basic attack]]s have massively increased range and cause him to {{tip|dash|leap}} to the target's location, attacking the target upon arrival and landing closer than his normal {{tip|melee}} range. This effect lingers for {{tt|{{fd|0.25}}|Estimated}} seconds upon exiting brush but is lost immediately if '''Rengar''' casts {{si|Flash}} or {{si|Hexflash}} to do so. Leaping with {{as|0 Ferocity|buzzword3}} generates {{as|1 Ferocity|buzzword3}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Bonetooth Necklace:}} {{tip|takedown|Takedowns}} on enemy champions within {{fd|1.5}} seconds of being damaged by '''Rengar''' grant him a '''Trophy''' per unique champion, up to 5. An [[File:Head of Kha'Zix.png|20px|border|link=]] additional one is made available through the event [[The Hunt is On!]] '''Trophies''' grant {{as|{{pp|type=[[File:Bonetooth Necklace Green.png|20px|border|adjustsize|link=]] trophies|key=%|x^2 for 6|x;Head of Kha'Zix|formula=(Number of Trophies) * (Number of Trophies)}} '''bonus''' AD}} as {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Rengar generates 1 Ferocity whenever he casts a Champion ability or uses Rengar's Savagery first attack. Reaching 4 Ferocity renders his next basic ability empowered, granting an additional cast along with 1 to 13 ‒ undefined bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds at the cost of consuming all Ferocity. Reaching 4 Ferocity with Rengar's Savagery or Rengar's Bola Strike locks its empowered version from use for 0.1 seconds before and after casting it. All Ferocity is lost after being combat status for 8 seconds.
While in brush, Rengar's basic attacks have massively increased range and cause him to leap to the target's location, attacking the target upon arrival and landing closer than his normal melee range. This effect lingers for 0.25 seconds upon exiting brush but is lost immediately if Rengar casts Flash or Hexflash to do so. Leaping with 0 Ferocity generates 1 Ferocity.
Innate - Bonetooth Necklace: Takedowns on enemy champions within 1.5 seconds of being damaged by Rengar grant him a Trophy per unique champion, up to 5. An File:Head of Kha'Zix.png additional one is made available through the event The Hunt is On! Trophies grant x;Head of Kha'Zix ‒ undefined bonus AD as bonus attack damage.
skills.notes:
* '''Rengar''' will not leap to targets already in his normal [[basic attack]] range.
* While {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}}, '''Rengar''' loses the enhanced {{sti|attack range}} from ''Unseen Predator''.
* '''Rengar''' will only leap to a target if his basic attack timer has been refreshed (if not so he will not automatically attempt to path towards his target, despite them being within leap range).
* Only {{si|Flash}} and {{si|Hexflash}} instantly end ''Unseen Predator''. Other effects (i.e {{si|Teleport}}) will still keep the buff for the specified amount of time upon leaving {{tip|brush}}.
* '''Rengar''' can freely use any [[champion ability|abilities]], [[summoner spell]]s, or [[active ability items|item actives]] while leaping.
** Using a {{tip|dash}} or {{tip|blink}} ability will interrupt the leap.
* The leap's attack will have no effect if the target dies or becomes {{tip|untargetable}}. {{ais|Savagery|Rengar}} empowered attack will always be consumed.
* The attack from the leap will:
** ''Not'' go off if the dash was interrupted.
** Go off at the end of the dash even if its normal destination is obstructed by boundaries he cannot cross (e.g. terrain, {{ai|The Hextech Ultimatum|Camille}}).
** Go off regardless of distance the enemy travels away from '''Rengar's''' original location.
** Go off even if '''Rengar''' loses {{tip|sight}} of the target.
* {{iis|Rapid Firecannon}} and {{ais|Savagery|Rengar}} '''bonus''' ranges are lost after {{fd|0.25}} seconds upon gaining ''Unseen Predator'', and are re-gained after {{fd|0.25}} seconds upon losing ''Unseen Predator''.
* ''Bonetooth Necklace'' uses different icons corresponding to the number of stacks acquired: 
** {{sbc|1 Stack:}} [[File:Bonetooth Necklace Green.png|20px|border|link=]] 
** {{sbc|2 Stacks:}} [[File:Bonetooth Necklace Green 2.png|20px|border|link=]]
** {{sbc|3 Stacks:}} [[File:Bonetooth Necklace Green 3.png|20px|border|link=]]
** {{sbc|4 Stacks:}} [[File:Bonetooth Necklace Green 4.png|20px|border|link=]]
** {{sbc|5 Stacks:}} [[File:Bonetooth Necklace Green 5.png|20px|border|link=]]
** {{sbc|6th Stack:}} [[File:Head of Kha'Zix.png|20px|border|link=]] '''Head of Kha'Zix'''

skills.name: Savagery
description:
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Rengar's''' next two basic attacks within 3 seconds gain {{sti|{{as|40% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}}, with the first also having an {{tip|uncancelable windup}}, gaining {{sti|range|25 '''bonus''' range}} and dealing {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
<!-- BONUS DAMAGE ONLY -->
{{sbc|Empowered Active:}} ''Savagery's'' {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} is modified and grants '''Rengar''' {{as|{{pp|key=%|50 to 101}} {{sti|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 5 seconds.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Rengar's next two basic attacks within 3 seconds gain 40% bonus attack speed, with the first also having an uncancelable windup, gaining 25 bonus range and dealing bonus physical damage.
Empowered Active: Savagery's bonus physical damage is modified and grants Rengar 50% − 101% (based on level) bonus attack speed for 5 seconds.
Savagery resets Rengar's basic attack timer.
leveling: {{st|{{tt|Bonus Physical Damage|The wiki denotes only the bonus damage, not the total scaling}}|{{ap|30 to 150}} {{as|(+ {{ap|0 to 20}}% AD)}}}}
{{st|Empowered Bonus Physical Damage|{{pp|30;45;60;75;90;105;120;135;150;160;170;180;190;200;210;220;230;240|formula = 15 + 15 per level up to 9, then + 10 per level up to 18}} {{as|(+ 40% AD)}}}}
skills.notes: * The enhanced attack applies other {{tip|on-hit}} effects as well as {{stil|life steal}} and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal (the bonus damage cannot) but does not deal bonus damage to structures (the attack will still be consumed however).

effects.str: • Bonus Physical Damage: (+ % AD)

st_slices: Bonus Physical Damage

subeffects.title: Bonus Physical Damage

effects.str: • Empowered Bonus Physical Damage: 30;45;60;75;90;105;120;135;150;160;170;180;190;200;210;220;230;240undefined − (based on level) (+ 40% AD)

skills.name: Battle Roar
skills.blurb: Rengar lets out a battle roar, damaging enemies and healing for some of the recent damage he has taken. Ferocity effect: additionally breaks crowd control effects.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rengar''' lets out a battle roar, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies and {{as|{{pp|65 to 130}} '''bonus''' magic damage}} to {{tip|monster|monsters}}, and {{tip|healing}} himself for 50% of the {{tt|post-mitigation damage|Damage calculated after modifiers}} he has taken in the last {{fd|1.5}} seconds, increased to 100% of damage taken from {{tip|monster|monsters}}.
{{sbc|Empowered Active:}} ''Battle Roar's'' {{as|magic damage}} is modified and additionally {{tip|cleanse|cleanses}} '''Rengar''' of all {{tip|crowd control}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Rengar lets out a battle roar, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and 65undefined − 130undefined (based on level) bonus magic damage to monsters, and healing himself for 50% of the post-mitigation damage he has taken in the last 1.5 seconds, increased to 100% of damage taken from monsters.
Empowered Active: Battle Roar's magic damage is modified and additionally cleanses Rengar of all crowd control.
skills.notes: * ''Grey Health'' (the damage stored in the last {{fd|1.5}} seconds) will not be consumed upon casting ''Battle Roar'' despite visually appearing so. It will only ever expire after its duration ends.

effects.str: • Empowered Magic Damage: 50undefined − 220undefined (based on level) (+ 80% AP)

st_slices: 50undefined − 220undefined (based on level) (+ 80% AP)

skills.name: Bola Strike
skills.blurb: Rengar throws a bola, slowing the first target hit for a short duration. Ferocity effect: roots the target.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rengar''' throws a bola in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to the first enemy hit and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for {{fd|1.75}} seconds.
{{sbc|Empowered Active:}} ''Bola Strike's'' {{as|physical damage}} is modified and {{tip|root|roots}} its target for {{fd|1.75}} seconds.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Rengar throws a bola in the target direction, dealing physical damage to the first enemy hit and slowing them for 1.75 seconds.
Empowered Active: Bola Strike's physical damage is modified and roots its target for 1.75 seconds.
skills.notes:
* If '''Rengar''' casts {{ai|Savagery|Rengar}} and/or {{ai|Battle Roar|Rengar}} during ''Bola Strike's'' cast time, he will buffer them and cast them when ''Bola Strike'' completes.
* ''Bola Strike'' will cast from wherever '''Rengar''' is at the end of the cast time.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 80% bonus AD)
  • Slow: %
• Empowered Physical Damage: 50undefined − 305undefined (based on level) (+ 80% bonus AD)

skills.name: Thrill of the Hunt
skills.blurb: Rengar's predatory instincts take over, Camouflaging him and revealing the nearest enemy champion in a large radius around him. During Thrill of the Hunt, Rengar gains Movement Speed and he can leap to the tracked enemy for a guaranteed critical strike, even without being in brush.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rengar''' activates his predatory instincts, {{tip|true sight|revealing}} the nearest enemy champion in a large radius and gaining {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for a duration.

After 2 seconds, he also becomes {{tip|camouflage|camouflaged}} and gains {{ai|Unseen Predator|Rengar}} for the remaining duration. His next basic attack within {{tt|normal attack range|125 range}} against any enemy unit or with ''Unseen Predator'' against the nearest enemy champion deals {{as|50% AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and {{sti|armor penetration|{{as|reduces the target's armor}}}} for 4 seconds.
The nearest enemy champion to '''Rengar''' alerts all of their allies within 1200 range about his presence, and they can sense him at 1600 range.
[[Basic attack|Attacking]] or casting [[champion ability|abilities]], though not {{ai|Savagery|Rengar}}, ends ''Thrill of the Hunt'' immediately.
''Enemy champions spotted by Thrill of the Hunt stay {{tip|true sight|revealed}} within '''Rengar's''' reveal range while the stealth persists.''
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Rengar activates his predatory instincts, revealing the nearest enemy champion in a large radius and gaining bonus movement speed for a duration.
After 2 seconds, he also becomes camouflaged and gains Rengar's Unseen Predator for the remaining duration. His next basic attack within normal attack range against any enemy unit or with Unseen Predator against the nearest enemy champion deals 50% AD bonus physical damage and reduces the target's armor for 4 seconds.
The nearest enemy champion to Rengar alerts all of their allies within 1200 range about his presence, and they can sense him at 1600 range.
Basic attack or casting champion ability, though not Rengar's Savagery, ends Thrill of the Hunt immediately.
Enemy champions spotted by Thrill of the Hunt stay revealed within Rengar's reveal range while the stealth persists.
skills.notes:
* ''Thrill of the Hunt's'' duration starts on-cast.
* The armor reduction applies ''after'' the attack.
* The {{tip|true sight}} reveal on the target stays until the leap finishes.
* '''Rengar''' discerns a distinct [[File:Thrill of the Hunt 3.png|24px]] ''heart beat'' from revealed champions during ''Thrill of the Hunt''. The nearest detected enemy champion is also indicated as the victim, having two eyes above them. This indicator is visible to both teams and may switch targets.
* Alerted allies will hear a {{sm2|Rengar.UltimateActivation1.ogg|'''''threatening growl'''''}} following an eerie sound effect.
